titles.title: Expanding Access to Diabetes Self-Management Training Act of 2023
Expanding Access to Diabetes Self-Management Training Act of 2023

To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve access to diabetes outpatient self-management training services, to require the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation to test the provision of virtual diabetes outpatient self-management training services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

committee.name: House Energy and Commerce
committee.activity: Markup By, Markup By, Referred To

bill.summary:
Expanding Access to Diabetes Self-Management Training Act of 2023
This bill expands Medicare coverage of diabetes outpatient self-management training. It also requires the Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation to test a model in which such training is provided virtually.
